query: UPDATE deployment SET name = COALESCE($1, name), machine_type = COALESCE($2, machine_type), deploy_on_push = COALESCE($3, deploy_on_push), min_horizontal_scale = COALESCE($4, min_horizontal_scale), max_horizontal_scale = COALESCE($5, max_horizontal_scale), startup_probe_port = ( CASE WHEN $6 = 0 THEN NULL ELSE $6 END ), startup_probe_path = ( CASE WHEN $6 = 0 THEN NULL ELSE $7 END ), startup_probe_port_type = ( CASE WHEN $6 = 0 THEN NULL WHEN $6 IS NULL THEN startup_probe_port_type ELSE 'http'::EXPOSED_PORT_TYPE END ), liveness_probe_port = ( CASE WHEN $8 = 0 THEN NULL ELSE $8 END ), liveness_probe_path = ( CASE WHEN $8 = 0 THEN NULL ELSE $9 END ), liveness_probe_port_type = ( CASE WHEN $8 = 0 THEN NULL WHEN $8 IS NULL THEN liveness_probe_port_type ELSE 'http'::EXPOSED_PORT_TYPE END ) WHERE id = $10;
